Descriptions.LongDescription:
The Constants plugin, an experimental feature set, provides a mechanism for defining named Constants as well as updated versions of the TakeExposure, TakeManyExposures, and SmartExposure instructions.

Constant names are alphanumeric (case insensitive) and their value can be numeric or numeric expressions, which may themselves include other Constants (e.g. 12, 55.5, C*2).

These Constants can currently be used in the '#Iterations', 'Exposure Time', and 'Dither After' fields of the various Exposure commands.

Please report issues to chatter or plugin-discussions on the NINA Discord server
Descriptions.ShortDescription: This plugin allows for the creation of numerical constants that can then be used within the various 'Exposure' instructions to avoid repetitive entry and the potential mistakes that go with it.
